Unnamed: 2: Olive Oil to drizzle of top of Peppers
Cheddar Cheese,   as a melted garnish

Unnamed: 0: As it appears above, recipe yields how many servings?

Suatee garlic veggies in oil or butter add tomato sauce and spices .  Cook rice separately and cool, add to veggies. Allow to cool awhile so the cheese doesn't melt when you add it next.   (take out for Vegetarians)  Brown beef and pork and drain off fat, add to rice/veggie/cheese mixture.  taste for seasoning.   Stuff Peppers with the filling.   Bake about an hour in preheated 325 oven for about 45 minutes to an hour.   VARIATION.... one could also add cheddar cheese on top of the peppers about 10 minutes at the end of baking them.
